paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the TTR gene variants, including penetrance data and individual records.

individual_records.phenotype_details: diagnosed with familial transthyretin cardiomyopathy, presented with dyspnea and edema
individual_records.evidence_sentence: An endomyocardial biopsy analysis identified transthyretin amyloid with the Val122Ile mutation, confirming the diagnosis of familial transthyretin cardiomyopathy.

functional_data.summary: The Val122Ile mutation is associated with late-onset cardiac amyloidosis.

variants.segregation_data: The variant is confirmed in the patient with familial transthyretin cardiomyopathy.
variants.additional_notes: The patient was heterozygous for the Val122Ile mutation.
key_quotes: The Val122Ile mutation has been found to be present in 3–4% of the African American/Caribbean population.
TTR genetic testing showed that he is heterozygous for this mutation.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data regarding the TTR variant was successfully extracted.
